title: Yellow Pages: Goggomobil [advertisement]
brief_description: Tommy Dysart stars as the man searching through the Yellow Pages business telephone directory for a mechanic who can help his beloved, a rare ‘Goggomobil’ car from the 1950s (‘not the Dart’).
